AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Change Project Status Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ((COALESCE(@Projectstatus@,'')='OP' AND AD_Ref_List.value IN ('SPR_EXE')) OR (COALESCE(@Projectstatus@,'')='SPR_EXE' AND AD_Ref_List.value IN ('OP','SPR_FIN')) OR (COALESCE(@Projectstatus@,'')='SPR_FIN' AND AD_Ref_List.value IN ('SPR_EXE'))) AND AD_Ref_List.AD_Reference_ID = '800002'
